normalised: According to the I-M-D, the monsoon is expected to hit Kerala around fifth June two thousand and twenty four, give or take a few days. Temperatures in Delhi are projected to reach forty two degree celsius on first June two thousand and twenty four and remain high throughout the week. A severe heatwave warning has been issued for Rajasthan until third June two thousand and twenty four, with potential temperatures exceeding forty five degree celsius.
